document_data.name: The Bride
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bride''' was an ancient titaness who was the consort of the [[primordial]] [[Cirotralech]], and that was sealed alongside him in [[Fimbrul]], [[Laerakond]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|26}}
document_data.Description: The Bride had three heads and three sets of arms. The hair in each of her heads was colored with different shades of blue.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|29}}
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], the primordial cult known as the [[Sons of Winter]] was able to release the Bride from her slumber. While a band of adventurers was able to destroy the cult, the Bride fled the battlefield and began her preparations for the eventual revival of Cirotralech.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|26}}
